## About Me: My name is Ethan Deutsch and I am a senior majoring in Statistics and minoring in Political Science at Macalester College in St. Paul, MN. I am currently an Assistant Statistician for the Volleyball and Basketball teams at Macalester and I am a Data Analyst Intern for Compeer Financial in Lakeville, MN. Additionally, I am also a student-athlete at Macalester playing Golf for the past four years. 

## Education: I graduated from Lehman High School in 2018 and I am currently en route to graduate from Macalester with a Bachelors of Science in 2022.
